author: PTI
title: Government bans issuing tourist visa to foreign Tablighi activists
description: The government has decided not to issue tourist visa to any foreigner who wish to visit India and take part in Tablighi activities, officials said on Tuesday.
content: The government has decided not to issue tourist visa to any foreigner who wish to visit India and take part in Tablighi activities, officials said on Tuesday. The decision has been taken after it was found that about 2,100 foreigners have come to India since … [+597 chars]
